{"id":285922698,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1576346318,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/285922698/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"9.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        const size_t sz = s.size();\n        size_t start = -1;\n        vector<char> chars(256);\n        int m = 0, length = 0;\n        for(size_t i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {\n            if(chars[s[i]]) {\n                char duplicate = s[i];\n                while(duplicate != s[++start] && start != i) {\n                    chars[s[start]] = false;\n                    --length;\n                }\n                chars[s[start]] = false;\n                --length;\n            }\n            chars[s[i]] = true;\n            m = max(m, ++length);\n        }\n        return m;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
